main.name: Akhil Amudala
main.description: Aspiring software engineer with experience in a dynamic and fast-paced environment. Comfortable with programming in Python and Java. An enthusiastic learner with profound logical reasoning, critical thinking, and proficient programming skills....
main.bio: True Assessment does not lie in the past or the present, but lies in the future. This is what I believed in and I follow in my life. An enthusiastic problem solver and have proficient skills in computer science and programming.

resume.skillmessage: In addition to my most proficient skills below, I have also worked on and have experience on Python, Java, C++, C, R, MATLAB, JavaScript, Kotlin, C#, HTML, CSS, Dart, AJAX, MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Flask, Spark, OpenCV, TensorFlow,Spring Boot, Bootstrap, React JS, Node JS, Selenium, Flutter, Hadoop, Jupyter, Git, REST APIs, AWS, Google Colab, Tableau, Apache Solr, MetaMap, Android Studio, Slack, Eclipse

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering

work.title: Curriculum Research Aide
work.description1: Developed Unity3D, AI, IM and SS courses with career paths and built website content for Verizon E-Learning Platform.
work.description2: Briefed development team on website research and made suggestions for website builds/products.
work.description3: Performed Quality Assurance, User Acceptance Testing, and Integrity checks for the developed Verizon E-learning website.

work.title: Mobile Application Developer
work.description1: Worked as a team in developing a mobile application called VBS, which acts as an emotional and mental balancing system.
work.description2: Performed Musical Note Identification technique from user audio file which generates various visualizations using python.
work.description3: Speech Emotion Recognition (SER) model is implemented in the application using technologies like Android Studio & Kotlin.

work.title: Web Developer & Entrepreneur Intern,
work.description1: Deployed a Fashion e-commerce website for the start-up project using python frameworks and improved design.
work.description2: Developed and programmed a product delivery system, which increased online sales by 25% and customer reach by 30%.
work.description3: Provided critical inputs, design guidance and Level 2 End-user Technical Support of eCommerce application.
work.description4: Actively worked on feedbacks, strived to continually improve performance, and assisted key users with UAT testing.

work.title: Efficient Approach to Predict Performance of Players

projects.title: AWS Cloud Application to Provide Image Recognition as a Service
projects.category: Developed a Web Application for image recognition using Amazon Machine Image and Implemented a load balancer to ensure the elasticity of the application by automatically Scaling out and Scaling in, On-Demand

projects.title: HealthCare Mining (COVID-19)
projects.category: Designed and programmed a web search interface using information extracted from scraped data of COVID-19 discussion forums, which is structured using MetaMap UMLS Annotator tool. Designed a Ranking algorithm to index the ontologies and an interface is set up on Apache SOLR using REST API.

projects.title: Academic Schedule Helper Application
projects.category: A ChatBot developed in selenium script which uses NLP techniques to read the query from VIT college students(users) via a telegram chat application to provide details about requested query, based on their course registration.

projects.title: Mess Management System
projects.category: Developed a website from scratch using Flask framework to provide registration facilities and maintenance of dine-in booking facilities for students as well as for VIT management for various operations in VIT hostels using DBMS.
